languages.text:
The Signet of the Inquisition provides great powers:
-<indent=5%>Grants +30 {g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetailsGlossary}momentum{/g}.</indent>
-<indent=5%>Removes {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}burning{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}bleeding{/g}, and {g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}toxin{/g} from the wearer and their allies.</indent>
-<indent=5%>Grants +{uip|THP|3d775c8682564aa6b12ab8f0c81956e5} temporary {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g} and +{uip|Armour|3d775c8682564aa6b12ab8f0c81956e5}% {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g} to the wearer and their allies until the end of combat.</indent>
languages.original_text:
Перстень Инквизиции предоставляет значительные возможности:
-<indent=5%>Дает 30 {g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetailsGlossary}моментума{/g}.</indent>
-<indent=5%>Снимает {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}горение{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}кровотечение{/g} и {g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}отравление{/g} с персонажа и его союзников.</indent>
-<indent=5%>Дает {uip|THP|3d775c8682564aa6b12ab8f0c81956e5} временного {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}здоровья{/g} и {uip|Armour|3d775c8682564aa6b12ab8f0c81956e5}% к {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}броне{/g} персонажу и его союзникам до конца боя.</indent>

-<indent=5%>Removes {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}burning{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}bleeding{/g}, and {g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}toxin{/g} from the wearer and their allies.</indent>
-<indent=5%>Grants +{uip|THP|3d775c8682564aa6b12ab8f0c81956e5} temporary {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g} and +{uip|Armour|3d775c8682564aa6b12ab8f0c81956e5}% {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g} to the wearer and their allies until the end of combat.</indent>

The Signet of the Inquisition grants great powers:
-<indent=5%>{g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetailsGlossary}Momentum{/g} is increased by +30.</indent>
-<indent=5%>{g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}Burning{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}bleeding{/g}, and {g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}toxin{/g} effects are removed from all allies (including the signet's wearer).</indent>
-<indent=5%>All allies (including the signet's wearer) gain +{uip|THP|3d775c8682564aa6b12ab8f0c81956e5} temporary {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g} and +{uip|Armour|3d775c8682564aa6b12ab8f0c81956e5}% {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g} until the end of combat.</indent>

-<indent=5%>Removes {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}burning{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}bleeding{/g}, and {g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}toxin{/g} from the wearer and their allies.</indent>
-<indent=5%>Grants +{uip|THP|3d775c8682564aa6b12ab8f0c81956e5} temporary {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g} and +{uip|Armour|3d775c8682564aa6b12ab8f0c81956e5}% {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g} to the wearer and their allies until the end of combat.</indent>

languages.text:
审判庭的图章拥有强大的力量：
- <indent=5%>{g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetailsGlossary}士气{/g}提高30点。</indent>
- <indent=5%>移除装备者与所有盟友的{g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}燃烧{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}流血{/g}与{g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}毒素{/g}效果。</indent>
- <indent=5%>装备者与所有盟友获得+{uip|THP|3d775c8682564aa6b12ab8f0c81956e5}临时{g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}生命值{/g}，+{uip|Armour|3d775c8682564aa6b12ab8f0c81956e5}%{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}护甲{/g}，效果持续至战斗结束。</indent>

审判庭的图章拥有强大的力量：
- <indent=5%>{g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetailsGlossary}士气{/g}提高30点。</indent>
- <indent=5%>移除所有盟友（包括图章的装备者本人）的{g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}燃烧{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}流血{/g}与{g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}毒素{/g}效果。</indent>
- <indent=5%>所有盟友（包括图章的装备者本人）获得{uip|THP|3d775c8682564aa6b12ab8f0c81956e5}点{g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}临时生命值{/g}与{uip|Armour|3d775c8682564aa6b12ab8f0c81956e5}%{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}护甲{/g}，效果持续至战斗结束。</indent>

languages.text:
異端審問庁の印章は強大な力を付与する：
・<indent=5%>{g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetailsGlossary}推進力{/g}が+30増加する。</indent>
・<indent=5%>使用者と使用者の味方から{g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}炎上{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}出血{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}毒{/g}を取り除く。</indent>
・<indent=5%>戦闘終了まで、使用者と使用者の味方は、一時的な{g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}傷{/g}への耐久力を+{uip|THP|3d775c8682564aa6b12ab8f0c81956e5}、{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}アーマー{/g}を+{uip|Armour|3d775c8682564aa6b12ab8f0c81956e5}％獲得する。</indent>

-<indent=5%>Removes {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}burning{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}bleeding{/g}, and {g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}toxin{/g} from the wearer and their allies.</indent>
-<indent=5%>Grants +{uip|THP|3d775c8682564aa6b12ab8f0c81956e5} temporary {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g} and +{uip|Armour|3d775c8682564aa6b12ab8f0c81956e5}% {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g} to the wearer and their allies until the end of combat.</indent>

異端審問庁の印章は強大な力を与える：
-<indent=5%>{g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetailsGlossary}推進力{/g}が+30追加される。</indent>
-<indent=5%>{g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}炎上{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}出血{/g}、そして{g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}毒素{/g}の効果は全ての味方(印章の着用者も含む) から取り除かれる。</indent>
-<indent=5%>全ての味方(印章の着用者も含む)は+{uip|THP|3d775c8682564aa6b12ab8f0c81956e5}の一時的な{g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}傷{/g}、そして+{uip|Armour|3d775c8682564aa6b12ab8f0c81956e5}%の{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}アーマー{/g}を戦闘終了まで得る。</indent>

languages.text:
Das Siegel der Inquisition gewährt mächtige Kräfte:
-<indent=5%>Gewährt +30 {g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetailsGlossary}Dynamik{/g}.</indent>
-<indent=5%>Befreit den Träger und seine Verbündeten von {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}Verbrennen{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}Blutung{/g} und {g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}Gift{/g}.</indent>
-<indent=5%>Gewährt dem Träger und seinen Verbündeten bis zum Ende des Kampfes +{uip|THP|3d775c8682564aa6b12ab8f0c81956e5} temporäre {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}Wunden{/g} und +{uip|Armour|3d775c8682564aa6b12ab8f0c81956e5} % {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}Rüstung{/g}.</indent>
languages.original_text:
The Signet of the Inquisition provides great powers:
-<indent=5%>Grants +30 {g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetailsGlossary}momentum{/g}.</indent>
-<indent=5%>Removes {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}burning{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}bleeding{/g}, and {g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}toxin{/g} from the wearer and their allies.</indent>
-<indent=5%>Grants +{uip|THP|3d775c8682564aa6b12ab8f0c81956e5} temporary {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g} and +{uip|Armour|3d775c8682564aa6b12ab8f0c81956e5}% {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g} to the wearer and their allies until the end of combat.</indent>

traits.locale_text:
Das Siegel der Inquisition gewährt mächtige Kräfte:
-<indent=5%>Gewährt +30 {g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetailsGlossary}Dynamik{/g}.</indent>
-<indent=5%>Befreit den Träger und seine Verbündeten von {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}Verbrennen{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}Blutung{/g} und {g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}Gift{/g}.</indent>
-<indent=5%>Gewährt dem Träger und seinen Verbündeten bis zum Ende des Kampfes +{uip|THP|3d775c8682564aa6b12ab8f0c81956e5} temporäre {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}Wunden{/g} und +{uip|Armour|3d775c8682564aa6b12ab8f0c81956e5} % {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}Rüstung{/g}.</indent>

Das Siegel der Inquisition gewährt vorteilhafte Kräfte:
-<indent=5%>{g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetailsGlossary}Dynamik{/g} wird um +30 erhöht.</indent>
-<indent=5%>Die Effekte {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}Verbrennen{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}Blutung{/g} und {g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}Toxin{/g} werden von allen Verbündeten entfernt.</indent>
-<indent=5%>Alle Verbündeten erhalten +{uip|THP|3d775c8682564aa6b12ab8f0c81956e5} temporäre {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}Wunden{/g} und +{uip|Armour|3d775c8682564aa6b12ab8f0c81956e5} % {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}Rüstung{/g} bis zum Ende des Kampfes.</indent>

languages.text:
La chevalière de l'Inquisition confère de grands pouvoirs :
-<indent=5%>Confère +30 de {g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetailsGlossary}fougue{/g}.</indent>
-<indent=5%>Dissipe tous les effets {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}Combustion{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}Saignement{/g} et {g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}Toxine{/g} affectant l'utilisateur et ses alliés.</indent>
-<indent=5%>Confère +{uip|THP|3d775c8682564aa6b12ab8f0c81956e5} {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}blessures{/g} temporaires et +{uip|Armour|3d775c8682564aa6b12ab8f0c81956e5} % d'{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armure{/g} à l'utilisateur et à ses alliés jusqu'à la fin du combat.</indent>

-<indent=5%>Grants +{uip|THP|3d775c8682564aa6b12ab8f0c81956e5} temporary {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g} and +{uip|Armour|3d775c8682564aa6b12ab8f0c81956e5}% {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g} to the wearer and their allies until the end of combat.</indent>

traits.locale_text:

-<indent=5%>Confère +30 de {g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetailsGlossary}fougue{/g}.</indent>

La chevalière de l'Inquisition confère de grands pouvoirs :
-<indent=5%>+30 à la {g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetailsGlossary}Fougue{/g}.</indent>
-<indent=5%>Les effets {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}Combustion{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}Saignement{/g} et {g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}Toxine{/g} affectant les alliés (porteur de la chevalière compris) sont dissipés.</indent>
-<indent=5%>Tous les alliés (porteur de la chevalière compris) gagnent +<u>(Persuasion du porteur/7)</u> {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}blessures{/g} temporaires et +<u>(Persuasion du porteur/10)</u> % d'{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armure{/g} jusqu'à la fin du combat.</indent>

La chevalière de l'Inquisition confère de grands pouvoirs :
-<indent=5%>+30 à la {g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetailsGlossary}Fougue{/g}.</indent>
-<indent=5%>Les effets {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}Combustion{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}Saignement{/g} et {g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}Toxine{/g} affectant les alliés (porteur de la chevalière compris) sont dissipés.</indent>
-<indent=5%>Tous les alliés (porteur de la chevalière compris) gagnent +{uip|THP|3d775c8682564aa6b12ab8f0c81956e5} {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}blessures{/g} temporaires et +{uip|Armour|3d775c8682564aa6b12ab8f0c81956e5} % d'{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armure{/g} jusqu'à la fin du combat.</indent>

languages.text:
El sello de la Inquisición proporciona efectos poderosos:
-<indent=5%>Otorga +30 de {g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetailsGlossary}ímpetu{/g}.</indent>
-<indent=5%>Elimina {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}quemadura{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}hemorragia{/g} y {g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}toxina{/g} del portador y sus aliados.</indent>
-<indent=5%>Otorga +{uip|THP|3d775c8682564aa6b12ab8f0c81956e5} {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}heridas{/g} temporales y +{uip|Armour|3d775c8682564aa6b12ab8f0c81956e5} % de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armadura{/g} al portador y a sus aliados hasta el final del combate.</indent>

-<indent=5%>Grants +30 {g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetailsGlossary}momentum{/g}.</indent>
-<indent=5%>Removes {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}burning{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}bleeding{/g}, and {g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}toxin{/g} from the wearer and their allies.</indent>
-<indent=5%>Grants +{uip|THP|3d775c8682564aa6b12ab8f0c81956e5} temporary {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g} and +{uip|Armour|3d775c8682564aa6b12ab8f0c81956e5}% {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g} to the wearer and their allies until the end of combat.</indent>

-<indent=5%>Otorga +30 de {g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetailsGlossary}ímpetu{/g}.</indent>

El sello de la Inquisición proporciona efectos beneficiosos:
-<indent=5%>El {g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetailsGlossary}Ímpetu{/g} aumenta +30.</indent>
-<indent=5%>Elimina los efectos de {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}quemadura{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}hemorragia{/g} y {g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}toxina{/g} de todos los aliados (incluido el portador del sello).</indent>
-<indent=5%>Todos los aliados (incluido el portador del sello) ganan +{uip|THP|3d775c8682564aa6b12ab8f0c81956e5} {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}heridas{/g} temporales, +{uip|Armour|3d775c8682564aa6b12ab8f0c81956e5} % de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armadura{/g} hasta el final del combate.</indent>

-<indent=5%>Дает {uip|THP|3d775c8682564aa6b12ab8f0c81956e5} временного {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}здоровья{/g} и {uip|Armour|3d775c8682564aa6b12ab8f0c81956e5}% к {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}броне{/g} персонажу и его союзникам до конца боя.</indent>

-<indent=5%>Grants +{uip|THP|3d775c8682564aa6b12ab8f0c81956e5} temporary {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g} and +{uip|Armour|3d775c8682564aa6b12ab8f0c81956e5}% {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g} to the wearer and their allies until the end of combat.</indent>

traits.locale_text:
Перстень Инквизиции дает значительные возможности:
-<indent=5%>+30 моментума</indent>
-<indent=5%>Со всех союзников снимаются эффекты {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}горения{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}кровотечения{/g} и {g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}отравления{/g}</indent>
-<indent=5%>Все союзники получают +<u>({g|Encyclopedia:SkillPersuasion}Убеждение{/g} персонажа / 7)</u> {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}временного здоровья{/g} и +<u>(Убеждение персонажа / 7)</u>% к {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}броне{/g} до конца боя</indent>

Перстень Инквизиции дает значительные возможности:
-<indent=5%>+30 моментума</indent>
-<indent=5%>Со всех союзников снимаются эффекты {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}горения{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}кровотечения{/g} и {g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}отравления{/g}</indent>
-<indent=5%>Все союзники получают +<u>({g|Encyclopedia:SkillPersuasion}Убеждение{/g} персонажа / 7)</u> {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}временного здоровья{/g} и +<u>(Убеждение персонажа / 7)</u>% к {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}броне{/g} до конца боя</indent>

Перстень Инквизиции дает значительные возможности:
-<indent=5%>+30 {g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetailsGlossary}моментума{/g}.</indent>
-<indent=5%>Со всех союзников (включая обладателя перстня) снимаются эффекты {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}горения{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}кровотечения{/g} и {g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}отравления{/g}.</indent>
-<indent=5%>Все союзники (включая обладателя перстня) получают +{uip|THP|3d775c8682564aa6b12ab8f0c81956e5} временного {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}здоровья{/g} и +{uip|Armour|3d775c8682564aa6b12ab8f0c81956e5}% к {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}броне{/g} до конца боя.</indent>

languages.text:
The Signet of the Inquisition grants great powers:
-<indent=5%>{g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetailsGlossary}Momentum{/g} increases by +30.</indent>
-<indent=5%>{g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}Burning{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}bleeding{/g}, and {g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}toxin{/g} effects are removed from all allies.</indent>
-<indent=5%>All allies gain +{uip|THP|3d775c8682564aa6b12ab8f0c81956e5} temporary {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g} and +{uip|Armour|3d775c8682564aa6b12ab8f0c81956e5}% {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g} until the end of combat.</indent>

traits.locale_text:
The Signet of the Inquisition grants great powers:
-<indent=5%>{g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetailsGlossary}Momentum{/g} increases by +30.</indent>
-<indent=5%>{g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}Burning{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}bleeding{/g}, and {g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}toxin{/g} effects are removed from all allies.</indent>
-<indent=5%>All allies gain +{uip|THP|3d775c8682564aa6b12ab8f0c81956e5} temporary {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g} and +{uip|Armour|3d775c8682564aa6b12ab8f0c81956e5}% {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g} until the end of combat.</indent>

languages.text:
Engizisyon'un Mührü, büyük güçler sağlar:
-<indent=5%>+30 {g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetailsGlossary}momentum{/g} kazandırır.</indent>
-<indent=5%>Takan kişi ve dost birimlerinin üzerindeki {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}yanma{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}kanama{/g} ve {g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}toksin{/g} etkilerini ortadan kaldırır.</indent>
-<indent=5%>Takan kişi ve dost birimlerine +{uip|THP|3d775c8682564aa6b12ab8f0c81956e5} geçici {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}sağlık{/g} puanı ve +%{uip|Armour|3d775c8682564aa6b12ab8f0c81956e5} {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}zırh{/g} kazandırır. Etkiler, çatışma sonuna dek sürer.</indent>
languages.original_text:
The Signet of the Inquisition provides great powers:
-<indent=5%>Grants +30 {g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetailsGlossary}momentum{/g}.</indent>
-<indent=5%>Removes {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}burning{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}bleeding{/g}, and {g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}toxin{/g} from the wearer and their allies.</indent>
-<indent=5%>Grants +{uip|THP|3d775c8682564aa6b12ab8f0c81956e5} temporary {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g} and +{uip|Armour|3d775c8682564aa6b12ab8f0c81956e5}% {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g} to the wearer and their allies until the end of combat.</indent>
